nodes.text: The Bounty Hunters Guild Handbook was a continually updated handbook written for bounty hunters wishing to join the Bounty Hunters' Guild. The Imperial edition was released whilst Cradossk was head of the guild. Several chapters were included from previous editions, and some were included unedited, such as that written by Gleed Ontondon.

Dengar gave Boba Fett a copy that was previously owned by both Greedo and Bossk. In addition to annotations by all four bounty hunters, Fett combined his handbook with a manifesto on Death Watch, and called it The Bounty Hunter Code.
